Thanks for letting us know! We appreciate your effort to keep Minds safe and secure.
We will review your report as soon as possible.
Earn tokens for your contributions to the network
Each day you will receive a contribution score for your activity on the network.
This score determines your share of the daily rewards pool and results in a payout of Minds Tokens, which can be used to support other channels or boost your content for more reach.
Earn daily tokens for creating popular content or referring your friends. Your rewards get multiplied the more active you are on the app.
You may only receive credit once per engagement type per day from validated channels
Earn daily tokens for your percent share of the total MINDS/ETH liquidity pair on Uniswap. Your rewards get multiplied the longer you hold your liquidity position for.
Earn daily tokens for your percent share of the total on-chain supply of MINDS. Your rewards get multiplied the longer you hold your tokens on-chain for.
We reward a fixed supply of 10,000 MINDS every day. These tokens are allocated towards engagement, liquidity and holding rewards.
The fuel of the Minds network
Buy tokens to support Minds and your favorite channels. Unlock premium features and launch advertising campaigns to expand your reach.
Tokens grant you advertising views on the network. Launch advertising campaigns, send offers for other channels to promote your post and grow your audience to new levels.
Coming soon: Connect your wallet to see if you qualify for a MINDS airdrop. You can read our blog to learn more about who qualifies.
Spend tokens to upgrade your channel to Pro or Plus. Access exclusive content and other custom offerings from your favorite creators.
Send tips and support other channels
Enjoy a post from another channel? Send them tokens to show your support. Tokens help other creators promote their content and build their network.
An ERC-20 token harnessing the Ethereum blockchain to give you full control over your crypto.
Minds tokens are accepted by Coinbase Custody for added security. The smart contracts have been fully audited and are available to view here.
Buying tokens is one of the best ways to keep Minds independent and support Internet freedom.
Token over 40 ETH need to be approved by Minds before they can be issued.
I am not listed on any US OFAC Sanction list or prohibited from engaging in business in the USA
I am purchasing the tokens for use on the Minds Platform, and not as an investment.
I have read and accept the Terms Of Sale for the Minds Token
Thank you for your purchase of Tokens
Your transaction is processing and we will notify you once the transaction is complete.
Because your purchase was over 60 ETH, it may take over 24 hours for the transaction to be completed. If you would like to contact us, please reach out to info@minds.com.
info Please check your wallet for transaction updates
Please enter your private key below in order to unlock your account. You can also drag and drop a CSV file into this window.
Don't have an address/private key? Checkout minds.com/wallet to create a wallet and learn how to get Minds tokens.
Drop key file below to auto-fill the field.
Remember this private key for 1 minute only.
Warning: Remembering the private key for the rest of the session can be insecure and might lead to your ETH being stolen.
Hey, do you want to setup your Tokens wallet?

Minds recommends MetaMask. It's a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. MetaMask includes a secure identity vault, providing a user interface to manage your identities on different sites and sign blockchain transactions.
There are no local wallets available, the wallet manager is locked, or you're connected to a different network.

Onchain payments will be published to the public blockchain. You may utilize Metamask or another address. These purchases require a Gas fee.
This balance is for the wallet that is currently active in your Ethereum interface.
This balance is for the wallet that is currently set up as the receiver wallet for your channel.
Offchain payments will not be published to the blockchain and are only usable for transactions up to 5,000 views.
This balance is for your Minds.com OffChain wallet. Transactions made from this address will not appear on the blockchain.
Credit cards may be used to boost, though we recommend first purchasing tokens in order to access a discount.
Expand your reach and gain thousands of views
Use Minds Tokens to gain more views on your content from other active channels on the network. Reach new audiences and grow your channels to the next level.
Expand your reach and access new audiences. You can exchange one Minds Token for 1,000 boosted views across the network.
Promote your content, group or channel directly in the newsfeed or sidebar of other active Minds channels.

Automate your content promotion by using a Boost Campaign. Set your own budget, choose the length of time to promote the content and decide what audience you would like to target. Then we will handle the rest!
Cut out the middle man and send an offer directly to another channel in exchange for sharing your content, group or channel on their feed to their audience.
We want you to have the option to handle your advertising relationships directly, without any risk of someone getting in the way.
Become a liquidity provider for automated boosting of your channel
Want to Boost a Post? Go to your channel to get started

Big tech has abused its power and lost the trust of its community. Their policies and behavior have caused polarization to reach all-time highs across the globe.
We are on a mission to elevate global discourse through Internet freedom.
We hold ourselves to certain principles to ensure that you are provided with unrestricted, real-time access to all information shared on the network.

Our code and algorithms are free and open source for maximum transparency and accountability. Our content policy is based on the First Amendment and governed by a community jury in order to minimize bias and censorship.
We believe you can only change someone's mind if you provide them with a platform to speak it.
The value in a social network lies in its community. You deserve to be rewarded for your contribution to the success and growth of the network.

Minds rewards you with MINDS Tokens (ERC-20) every day for creating popular content, referring friends or providing liquidity. The tokens can then be used to promote your content (1 token = 1,000 impressions) or send tips to content creators to show your support and unlock special perks.
Upgrade to Minds+ to access premium content and submit your own content for a share of our revenue.
Minds is an open source social network dedicated to Internet freedom. Speak freely, protect your privacy, earn crypto rewards and take back control of your social media.
Help translate Minds into every global language
Did you know that Minds will soon be available in ?

You can simply disconnect your YouTube account from Minds. In doing so, any previously posted videos will continue to be available on Minds.
Break free from the Google machine
Link your accounts so that every new upload to YouTube also posts to Minds. Import your full video library to protect your content from unfair censorship and demonetization.
Everyone earns Minds Tokens based on their daily contribution to the network, which can be used to boost your content and grow your audience.
Minds+ and Pro members unlock additional monetization features, including revenue-sharing and monthly cash payments for pageviews and referrals.
Tired of the unfair treatment from traditional social networks?
Minds offers a fully transparent, privacy-focused platform built for creators.
Take back control of your social media

We've recently updated our Terms of Service to reflect the changes to our network with the launch of the Jury System. These changes are being implemented to ensure a balance of power between Minds, Inc. and the community. The following is a brief summary of what has changed:
Please also note that your continued use of Minds serves as acceptance of these new terms and policies. Thank you.

If you wish to appeal, please contact us at info@minds.com.
Launch your own social networking app
Start your own white-labeled social networking app for web and mobile by leveraging Minds’ open source code base.
A platform branded your own way
Harness all of the features of Minds.com with your own design, brand name, domain and style. Set your own policies, develop your own network and contribute to the greater Minds open source project.
The platform includes a wide variety of features, such as analytics, wallet, encrypted messaging, newsfeed, content hosting, blog editing, groups, hashtags, search, payments, advertising and more.
The Minds platform is built for all platforms, including Android, iOS and major web browsers such as Firefox, Chrome, Safari and Brave.
Social networking is an essential tool for communicating inside your own company or reaching people outside.
Stop outsourcing your social media presence and losing all of your reach. Regain direct access to your audience.
All of your work will contribute to the greater Minds open source project of building free and open source social networking technology for the world.

Post original videos, blogs, photos and thoughts without hidden algorithms. Chat securely with friends, start groups and engage in civil discourse.
Setup membership tiers for your fans to support you in cash or crypto. Put premium content behind a paywall or support the independent creators you love.
Earn tokens for posting and curating content every day. 1 token can be used to boost a post for 1,000 views or tip other creators. Track cash and crypto transactions in your wallet.
Upgrade to Minds+ or Pro and start earning a share of our company’s revenue, in cash. Unlock exclusive content from our community-powered streaming service and access bonus features.
Join the world's first community-powered streaming service

Your monthly payments are shared directly with the creators who submit the most popular content. Unlock new features and help fund Minds filmmakers, writers, artists, memers, podcasters, musicians, journalists and more.
Click here to request to be verified
Access premium videos, blogs and photos from independent creators

We are democratizing the way media is created and consumed. Every time you watch a video, read a blog or view a photo in Minds+, that creator earns revenue. Your attention and support enables them to make a living doing what they love.
Submit content to Minds+ and earn a share of revenue

Minds+ is a new model for creators and brands to gain exposure and monetize their content. Our monthly revenue is shared directly with the creators who contribute the most popular and engaging exclusive content to Minds+.
If you pay for your membership in tokens, you are only eligible to be paid out in tokens. If you pay in cash, you are eligible to be paid out in cash, Bitcoin, Ether or tokens.
Imagine Netflix, but if anyone could submit content and earn!
Protect your content from censorship and demonetization

Migrate your entire YouTube library to Minds and automatically sync new uploads. Optionally post your public content to the Permaweb, a censorship-resistant and decentralized storage system. Upload unlimited HD video up to 95 minutes in duration. Get priority support.
Get a badge on your channel to increase your reputation and stand out.
Remove all boosted content from your feeds to keep your experience ad-free.

Receive tips and subscription payments in USD, Bitcoin, Ether or Minds Tokens. Earn a revenue-share for driving pageviews and referring new users to Minds. Tired of the manipulation and unfair treatment from traditional social networks?
Minds offers a fully transparent, privacy-focused platform with no bias, hidden algorithms or censorship.
A sustainable revenue model for everyone.

We are you. We are sharing our revenue with you to directly compensate for contributions to the network. As a community-owned company, it is essential to keep everyone's incentives aligned and inspired.
The more traffic and revenue that you drive, the more you earn and the healthier the ecosystem becomes.
Upload videos or images up to 60 minutes in length, 4 GB in size and 1080p in resolution. Publish your own blogs with our easy-to-use editor.

EarningsAt the end of each month, your earnings will move into your pending balance if you've reached the $100 threshold. When this happens, your earnings will be reset to zero. If you haven't reached the threshold, your earnings will rollover to the next month.
Pending Transfers This is the balance you've been paid out that will be transferred to your bank. Transfers may take up to 7 days.
Total Transferred This is the total amount that has been paid out to your bank

Your Ether address is the same as your on-chain address. Why? On-chain tokens run on the Ethereum network and require Ether to send.
To view or change your address, go to token settings.

Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.

Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a “Daily Reward Pool”. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.

Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a “Contribution Score” which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.

It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your off-chain address.
Used simply to verify your uniqueness.
Your Ethereum address allows you to start receiving payments on the blockchain.

You don’t need to use a Web3 Wallet provider. You can alternatively manage your own address.
Generate a custom address to use instead of a Wallet Provider. Once the address is generated, you will be provided with a link to download the address and private key.

The address was successully saved as your on-chain address. Click the button below to download its private key - you will need it to conduct transactions, so ensure you safely store the private key file.
Enter the address that will be stored as your wallet for Minds on-chain tokens and Ether payments. To conduct transactions you will need your wallet's private key.
This address is where you will receive on-chain Minds tokens and Ether payments

To receive on-chain payments from other channels (e.g. from a Wire or a Boost), you will need an on-chain address. You can change it here at any time. Note: your on-chain address is the same as your Ether address. Why? On-chain tokens run on the Ethereum network and require Ether to send.
